downloadDescription: Get an overview of the new asynchronous features being developed for C#, Visual Basic and the .NET Framework.
detailsSection: Get an overview of the new asynchronous features being developed for C#, Visual Basic and the .NET Framework.
systemRequirementsSection: • The Microsoft Word document download requires 58 KB of disk space to download and install. It also requires Microsoft Word or Microsoft Word Viewer to view.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download link to start the download.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, click Open or Run this program from its current location.
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, click Save or Save this program to disk.

relatedResourcesSection.title: visual Studio Async CTP on MSDN
